name: Nystatin

indications.text: nystatin cream indicated treatment cutaneous mucocutaneous mycotic infections caused candida albicans susceptible candida species . cream indicated systemic , oral , intravaginal ophthalmic .

contraindications.text: adults pediatric patients ( neonates older ) apply liberally affected areas twice daily indicated healing complete .

warningsAndPrecautions: nystatin cream usp yellow light green cream . supplied : 15 gram tube ndc 72162-2496-02 30 gram tube ndc 72162-2496-03 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . avoid freezing . repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc.burbank , ca 91504
adverseReactions: nystatin cream contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity components .
indications_original:
Nystatin cream is indicated in the treatment of cutaneous or mucocutaneous mycotic infections caused by Candida albicans and other susceptible Candida species.
                     This cream is not indicated for systemic, oral, intravaginal or ophthalmic use.
contraindications_original:
Adults and Pediatric Patients (Neonates and Older)
                     Apply liberally to affected areas twice daily or as indicated until healing is complete.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Nystatin Cream USP is a yellow to light green cream. It is supplied as:
                  15 gram Tube NDC 72162-2496-02
                  30 gram Tube NDC 
                     72162-2496-03
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted between 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Avoid freezing.
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions_original: Nystatin cream is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of its components.
